attributes.action: The British Government,to put in place a total ban on any further free movement of Labour,especially from any more European Countries.
attributes.additional_details:
At the present time the UK has unprecedented levels of unemployment and under employment.We must put a permanent ban on any further easing of restrictions.

This petition is neither offensive or a duplicate of any other petition,any refusal would be taken as an infringement of my human rights on freedom of speech and expression.
